page.title: 15AMENITIES
page.content: {VILLAGE HALL} WOMENS RURAL INSTITUTE - The rural is for grown-ups. They have a chat and have food like bacon & eggs etc. They also have cake & tea. They go to other places too. {GREG WADDELL.} {YOUTH CLUB }- In the village hall I go to the youth club. We play games like rounders, football, skipping & chess. The youth club leader is Jacqueline Black's Grandad, William Shields. We have a Christmas party and a Hallow'een party. We dress up at the Hallow'een party and have a fancy dress competition. We duck for apples which involves lots of apples in a tub of water while we try to pick the apples out with our teeth.{SARAH WANDS {SUNDAY SCHOOL }- The Sunday School teacher is Mrs. Margaret Black. {BADMINGTON }- The club is held each Monday evening in the hall.
